Class# OSAction

macOS 10.15+

```
class OSAction : OSObject, OSActionInterface
```

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/osaction#topics)

### [Instance Methods](/documentation/kernel/osaction#3223542)

[`- Aborted`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3366002-aborted)[`- Aborted_Impl`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3366003-aborted_impl)[`- Cancel`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3438205-cancel)Cancels the execution of the action's callbacks. [`- Dispatch`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3223366-dispatch)[`- EndWait`](/documentation/driverkit/osaction/endwait)[`- GetReference`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3438207-getreference)Returns a pointer to any additional memory allocated by the action object on your behalf.[`- SetAbortedHandler`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3438208-setabortedhandler)Install a handler for the system to call when no other processes reference the action object.[`- Wait`](/documentation/driverkit/osaction/wait)[`- WillWait`](/documentation/driverkit/osaction/willwait)[`- free`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3438209-free)Performs any final cleanup for the action object.[`- getMetaClass`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3223369-getmetaclass)### [Type Methods](/documentation/kernel/osaction#3223543)

[`+ Aborted_Invoke`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3366004-aborted_invoke)[`+ Create`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3438206-create)Creates a new action object and configures it with your custom target object and callback method. [`+ CreateWithTypeName`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3567113-createwithtypename)[`+ CreateWithTypeName_Call`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3567114-createwithtypename_call)[`+ CreateWithTypeName_Impl`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3567115-createwithtypename_impl)[`+ CreateWithTypeName_Invoke`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3567116-createwithtypename_invoke)[`+ Create_Call`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3223363-create_call)[`+ Create_Impl`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3223364-create_impl)[`+ Create_Invoke`](/documentation/kernel/osaction/3223365-create_invoke)## [Relationships](/documentation/kernel/osaction#relationships)
